title: AI strengthens journalism rather than replaces it, says Lanang MP
description: SIBU: Artificial intelligence should be seen as a tool to strengthen journalism rather than replace it, Lanang MP Alice Lau said, as she highlighted the evolving role of technology in the media industry.
content:
SIBU: Artificial intelligence should be seen as a tool to strengthen journalism rather than replace it, Lanang MP Alice Lau said, as she highlighted the evolving role of technology in the media industry.

title: Chris Pratt is at the 'Mercy' of an AI justice system in his new movie
description: Thriller 'Mercy' imagines a near future where the justice system is powered by artificial intelligence and suspects are presumed guilty unless they can prove their innocence.
content:
Thriller Mercy (showing at cinemas nationwide) imagines a near future where the justice system is powered by artificial intelligence and suspects are presumed guilty unless they can prove their innocence.

title: IndiaAI chief outlines roadmap ahead of Summit
description: As countries compete to build ever larger AI models, India is choosing a different path. “We are not…into the race for artificial general intelligence (AGI),” said Abhishek Singh, chief executive officer of the IndiaAI Mission, in an interview with HT, laying out a pragmatic vision for the country’s AI strategy ahead of the AI Impact Summit.| India News
content: AGI refers to hypothetical AI systems that are capable of performing any intellectual task a human can, rather than being limited to specific functions. Globally, all major AI labs like OpenAI, Google DeepMind, Anthropic, Meta AI (FAIR), Microsoft AI... [6349 chars]

title: AI content on Australian tour website sends tourists chasing hot springs that don’t exist
description: Trending News: An AI-generated travel article misled tourists to search for non-existent hot springs in Tasmania, highlighting the dangers of relying on artificial intelligence for travel information.
content:
Australian tour website’s AI content sends visitors on wild goose chase for non-existent Tasmanian hot springs

title: The Power Play: How AI is Redefining the Physical World of Real Estate
description: Artificial intelligence is often discussed as a digital phenomenon. It is viewed as code, algorithms, and virtual assistants. However, the reality of AI is deeply physical. Behind every line of generated text and every processed image lies a massive industrial infrastructure of servers, high-voltage wires, and specialized cooling systems.
